Suha - Multipurpose Ecommerce Mobile Template

A versatile e-commerce shop template. It is very nicely designed with modern features & coded with the latest technology. It nicely views on all devices with smartphones, tablets, laptops & desktops.

Click the button to live preview
Scan to view on your mobile device

Main Features

Here are some core features of this template. Lots of features & layouts are in the demo. Explore now!

  • PWA ReadyHOT
  • Versatile e-commerce shop template
  • Nicely designed with modern features
  • Coded with the latest technology
  • 41+ necessary pages
  • Bug free code
  • Cross browser support
  • Multi step checkout
  • Notifications pages
  • Language page
  • Password strength meter
  • OTP pages
  • Dropdown menu in sidebarNew
  • Bootstrap 5HOT
  • Node package manager (npm)
  • Gulp 4
  • Sass CSS preprocessor
  • Pug (formerly Jade)
  • jQuery 2.2.4
  • Live chat
  • Support page
  • Authentication pages
  • Unique design
  • About us page
  • Blog pages
  • Google fonts
  • Easy to customize
  • Clean & 100% validate code
  • Privacy policy
  • Settings page
  • Real support
  • Dark / Night mode
  • Contact page
  • Profile page
  • Lots of new features coming soon
